column4: hi all, does ayone know which packages has to be installed so that the java test on java.com does not fail. i have already installed ubuntu-restricted-extras (which should have already covered it) and sun-java6-jre and still it fails??
sun-java6-plugin or the plugin pop-up that appears when going to the site?
the install missing plugin request to install the plugin, which was already installed with restricted extras?
